name: Dark Brown Jaggery
description: Rich, dark jaggery with a deep flavor. Perfect for traditional recipes and healthy alternatives to sugar.
usage: Use in tea, coffee, desserts, or traditional recipes.
storage: Store in a cool, dry place.

name: Dark Gold Jaggery
description: Smooth and aromatic jaggery with a golden hue. Ideal for desserts and beverages.
usage: Use in sweets, beverages, or as a sugar substitute.
storage: Store in a cool, dry place.

name: Jaggery Powder
description: Finely ground jaggery for easy use in recipes. A healthy substitute for refined sugar.
usage: Use in baking, smoothies, or as a sweetener.
